title: Billy Geraghty
deck: I'm married to the lovely Jean and have one son, Martin, and two grandchildren, Matthew and Charlotte. I am a qualified British Cycling Level 3 coach, so you’ll find me over at York Sports Village coaching kids cycling #cliftonfastkids. Jean and I lead one of Gateway’s Lifegroups and we are privileged to be involved with a great bunch of people in the group.
